name: Journey To The East (SkrProductions)
description:
So, my recent game, The Itch, received a lot of responses lately. This inspired me to make yet another game! This game is a top-down bullet hell shooter with pretty unique and new gameplay you might have never seen of! 

GAMEPLAY

The gameplay is pretty simple yet addicting. You have to kill and slash through endless ways of enemies including zombies, Dangerous toys, flesh slashers, Bandits, lamps, you name it! Don't worry, you not only have your gun but also your katana to hack 'n slash to hordes of enemies, And did I mention you have supernatural powers e.g. Lightning bolts and fire balls? Yeah, you are pretty overpowered too. But don't underestimate the enemies! I challenge that you can't survive even for 2 mins. 

FEATURES

- Gives the player thrilling and addicting gameplay!

 - Jumpscares to scare the sh*t out of you. ( Well not that scary)

 - Many ways to kill your enemies - either fill them with bullets, cut through them using your katana, Strike them with lightning and even fry them up with your Huge( like your mom hehe) fireballs.

 - Different soundtracks acquire their behavior depending on the situation.

 - In-game controls help feature.

 - A large map with different places to explore.

 - P.S. - A house in which you can hide but I would not recommend it.

 - Available for Windows, Linux, and macOS.

CONTROLS

W, A, S, and D/ Arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to perform rolls.

Left Mouse Button to shoot.

Right Mouse Button to use katana.

Q key to summon lightning.

E key to throw huge fireballs.

ESC key to pause as well as access the UI.

CREDITS 

All game code, design, art is done by me within a period of 7 days.

Softwares used - Unity for game designing, Visual Studio for scripting, Photoshop and pixilart for sprite designing, Bfxr for sound effects, Audacity and Cakewalk for Soundtracks.
